Our Works

About us

The owner of the company is working in electrical field since 35 years. we are undertaking all types of electrical jobs.

We are specialized in every field in Electrical Installation in commercial, residential and industrial premises like corporate offices, show-rooms, factories, hotels, farm-houses, multi-storeybuildings, residential-bungalows, co-operative societies, guest-house etc.we have successfully completed many projects with our quality controlled work.

We have completed our jobs diligently and other infrastructural projects. we are expert in electrification of prefabricated buildings. With a rich experience in the field of electrical we have build up our reputation through our excellent service and high standard workmanship. Our expert team utilizes their experience in using modern equipments for better and reliable electrical works.we understand the various work comprising the electrical equipment installation, commissioning contracts.
